bio.p: Ph.D. student Luiz G. Greca was awarded an exchange scholarship from The Brazilian National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq). During this time, he enrolled in marine technology and materials science courses at Aalto University and worked for six months at the Technical Research Centre of Finland (VTT). In 2016, he graduated as a Mechanical Engineer at the Pontifical Catholic University of Paran√°, Brazil. Currently, his research interest includes the fabrication of structured lignocellulosic materials for high-value applications.
